interface.name: FtpDirParser
interface.javadoc:
This interface describes a parser for the FtpClient class. Such a parser is used when listing a remote directory to transform text lines like: drwxr-xr-x 1 user01 ftp 512 Jan 29 23:32 prog into FtpDirEntry instances.
java.net.FtpClient#setFileParser(FtpDirParser)
1.7

Takes one line from a directory listing and returns an FtpDirEntry instance based on the information contained.
line a String, a line sent by the FTP server as a result of the LST command.
an FtpDirEntry instance.
java.net.FtpDirEntry
